    • NumberCrush

      public NumberCrush​(int numRows, int numCols, int max)
      Constructor for make a board
      Parameters:
      NumberCrush -
      numRows - return number of rows on board
      numCols - return number of columns on board
      max - is return how much numbers we want in game

    • isValidSwap

      public boolean isValidSwap​(int row1, int col1, int row2, int col2)
      check whether the given swap is valid. return true if swap is valid returns False if swap is invalid Move
      Parameters:
      toyBoard - constructor in which the role is not visible becuase it is activated when cross section occrus,
      toyBoard - the elements fall in such a way that the cross section can be repeated ,the toyBoard eliminates them
      row1 - and col1 is coordinates for first Number
      row2 - and col2 is coordinates for second Number

    • makeSwap

      public void makeSwap​(int row1, int col1, int row2, int col2)
      swap the given pieces, then call eliminateMatches() and then dropPieces() until no matches exist
      Parameters:
      tmp - an auxilary variable when making a swap
